mn116:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati isigilismiṁ pabbate.
mn116:2.1: “Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṁ vebhāraṁ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.3: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, vebhārassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:2.4: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṁ paṇḍavaṁ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.6: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, paṇḍavassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:2.7: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṁ vepullaṁ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.9: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, vepullassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:2.10: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṁ gijjhakūṭaṁ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.12: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, gijjhakūṭassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:2.13: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, imaṁ isigiliṁ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:3.1: “Imassa kho pana, bhikkhave, isigilissa pabbatassa esāva samaññā ahosi esā paññatti.
mn116:3.2: Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, pañca paccekabuddhasatāni imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsino ahesuṁ.
mn116:3.3: Te imaṁ pabbataṁ pavisantā dissanti, paviṭṭhā na dissanti.
mn116:3.10: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn116:3.11: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
mn116:4.1: “Ariṭṭho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.2: upariṭṭho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.3: tagarasikhī nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.4: yasassī nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.5: sudassano nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.6: piyadassī nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.7: gandhāro nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.8: piṇḍolo nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.9: upāsabho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.10: nīto nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.11: tatho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi,
mn116:4.12: sutavā nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.13: bhāvitatto nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi.
mn116:6.10: Aṅgo ca paṅgo ca guttijito ca;
